Extra Attack: +1 Attacks Per Round

Action Surge: May take an extra action 1/short rest
Combat Superiority: May use 5d8 Superiority Dice to perform 5 chosen Maneuvers/short rest
Commander's Strike: May spend a Superiority Die and forego an attack to use a bonus action directing an ally attack; ally uses Reaction to attack and adds Superiority Die to damage
Disarming Attack: May add a Superiority Die to damage and cause foe to drop an item (DC 16 Strength neg)
Dragon Fear: R30' Targets frightened for 1 min (DC 14 Wisdom neg)
Dwarven Fortitude: Dodge restores 1 HD+3 (minimum 1) HP
Elven Accuracy: Reroll 1 die when attacking using Dexterity, Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma w/Adv
Fade Away: Become invisible after taking damage for 1 rd 1/short rest
Know Your Enemy: Knows how foe compares to self after 1 min study
Orcish Fury: Extra damage die 1/short rest, use Reaction after Relentless Endurance for extra attack
Parry: May use a Superiority Die and Reaction to subtract Superiority Die + 5 from self damage by a foe
Second Chance: Use Reaction to force foe attack reroll 1/short rest
Second Wind: May use a bonus action to regain 1d10+8 HP 1/short rest
Squat Nimbleness: Adv on Athletics or Acrobatics to break grapple
Sweeping Attack: After a successful attack, may inflict a Superiority Die HP on another adjacent foe
Trip Attack: After a successful attack, may spend a Superiority Die to knock foe prone (DC 16 Strength neg) and add Superiority Die to damage

Dispel Magic (S3 [Drow High Magic] Abju): R120' Ends the effects of a spell up to level 3; successful DC 10 + spell level ends a higher-level spell [+Level ends any spell of equal or lesser level]
Levitate (S2 [Drow High Magic] Tran): R60' Target floats (Constitution neg) for conc up to 10 min
Longstrider (D1 [Wood Elf Magic] Tran): Touched gains +10' Speed for 1 hr [+Level affects +1 target]
Misty Step (W2 [Fey Teleportation] Conj): Teleports self 30'
Pass Without Trace (D2 [Wood Elf Magic] Abju): Targets in a 30' radius gain +10 Stealth and become trackable only by magic for conc up to 1 hr
Magic Notes:
Wood Elf Magic: Know 1 D0 cantrip, cast Longstrider and Pass Without Trace 1/long rest
Drow High Magic: Cast Detect Magic at will, Dispel Magic and Levitate 1/long rest
Fey Teleportation: Cast Misty Step 1/short rest
Flames Of Phlegethos: Fire spells reroll 1s on damage, inflict 1d4 HP fire on adjacent creatures, and give 30' light for 1 rd
